summary: This Mod Changes Ulfric Stormcloak Into How I See Him.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]The Real Ulfric[/b]
[/size]
This Mod Changes Ulfric Stormcloak Into How I See Him.
In The Intro To Helgen He Now Has Real Prison Clothes On For Immersion Purposes.
Later In The Game When You Meet Him Again He Has New Armor But It Is Unplayable.
I Did Not Want To Let Him Be Stripped Naked When Killed By The Imperials.
His Old Outfit Is In A Chest In His Bedroom At Palace Of The Kings If You Want It.
But The Clothes Will Be Marked As Stolen When Taken.

Instalation: Place In Skyrim Data Folder.
author: JP0005
